Installation went on smoothly on my Aspire X3200
For installation I had to use the generic acer OEM key;
The key on the sticker of my computer wouldn't go through.
For activation, I used OEM BIOS Emulation Toolkit For Windows Vista x86 v1.0
Thanks Lizav.

DOES that serial works or DOESN'T that works? IF it does work, why it doesn't work on my computer?!? Or do I have to do something special that the serial would work? Have you got any other working serial code that would work with this Vista system?
